Uses of Class
de.nec.nle.siafu.model.Position

  • Packages that use Position 
    Package Description
    de.nec.nle.siafu.externalCommand
    Classes in this package provide the TCP based interface to control the simulator.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics
    Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.model
    This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects.

      Get the direction towards which an agent should walk in order to reach the gradient center fastest.
      int Place.pointFrom(Position targetPos, int preferedDir)
      This method is identical to pointFrom(targetPos) except if several directions turn out to be equally good, the one given as priority is returned.
